text: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَـٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقًا

translation.en.sahih: And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision
translation.id.indonesian: Dan bahwasanya: jikalau mereka tetap berjalan lurus di atas jalan itu (agama Islam), benar-benar Kami akan memberi minum kepada mereka air yang segar (rezeki yang banyak).
